$interpreted:
Lisa: Today was so much fun.
Thank you for asking me out on a date, darling~
Ned: You're welcome...
Ned: Lisa, close your eyes for a little bit.
Lisa: N, Ned!?
Lisa: Sure, whatever you say...
Ned: There's dust on your eyelashes. I wiped them off for you.
Lisa: Aww~ what, is that all? I got excited for nothing...
Lisa: But, this side of you is also what I liked about you the most~~
Lisa: It's getting late too. It's about time I go back.
Lisa: Ned?
Ned: Lisa, do you know about the marriage traditions in Poleva Desert?
Lisa: Eh? Why did you bring that up all of a sudden...
Ned: Both sides gift each other their most treasured possession. If one holds on to the token for a month, it means they cherish their partner.
Ned: Their marriage is only then acknowledged by the people.
Ned: This is a lucky charm I always carry with me when I hunt. I'm not sure if this is worthy to be a marriage token.
Lisa: D, does this mean that you... could it be?
Ned: Yes. Lisa, ummm...
Ned: W, will you marry me?
Lisa: Yes!
Ned: Really!?
Lisa: Of course I will! To be honest with you, I already prepared my token. Wait here, I'll rush back home and get it so we can exchange immediately.
Ned: Right.
Lisa: Ah, I shouldn't have told Ned to "wait here". Being the blockhead that he is, he'll definitely stand and wait in the desert until I return.
Lisa: This... what the hell is going on?
Punk: Damnit, we're not getting our reward for this, are we?
Goon: Whaddaya expect? Mister Sherlock is known for his stinginess!
Lisa: Father!?
Lisa: You two, stop right there! I have some questions for you folks!
Lisa: Speak; what business do you have with Ned?
Punk: Ok, ok, ok, we'll speak... stop hitting us!
Goon: Hey, are you sure about this?
Punk: Who cares, we're not getting the reward anyway.
Goon: Good point... Sherlock filed a request to us. He said he wants us to teach his daughter's lover a "harsh" lesson.

Lisa: What did you say!?
Fa~ther~~!
Sherlock: So you're home? Someone gifted me a Beastbone cake today; should be behind the checkout counter...
Lisa: Father, did you hire someone to ambush Ned?

Sherlock: What!? How did you know about that...
Ah, crap!
Lisa: Why would you do that? Ned has been really nice to me all this time.
Sherlock: That guy is just a poor huntsman. He's not worthy to be with you. Your life will be troublesome if you end up with him!

Lisa: I don't give a damn about such superficial nonsense.
Ned is the dearest person to me right now.

Sherlock: Didn't you say that daddy is the dearest to you when you were a little girl? 
Are all humans this unfaithful?
Sherlock: No wonder you don't buy me motor oil these days...

Lisa: What are you talking about, 
I just bought some for you the last time I was here with Puggi.
Sherlock: That was the only time in six months!
Lisa: Ugh, can't talk sense into you. Whatever, I won't care about you anymore!

Lisa: Ned has already given me his marriage token. 
Even if you're against it,
Lisa: a month later, I shall still marry him.
Sherlock: WHAT? I will not allow such a thing to happen! Stop right there!

Thank you for asking me out on a date, darling~
You're welcome...
Lisa, close your eyes for a little bit.
N, Ned!?
Sure, whatever you say...
There's dust on your eyelashes. I wiped them off for you.
Aww~ what, is that all? I got excited for nothing...
But, this side of you is also what I liked about you the most~~
It's getting late too. It's about time I go back.
Ned?
Lisa, do you know about the marriage traditions in Poleva Desert?
Eh? Why did you bring that up all of a sudden...

D, does this mean that you... could it be?
Yes. Lisa, ummm...

Yes!
Really!?
Of course I will! To be honest with you, I already prepared my token. Wait here, I'll rush back home and get it so we can exchange immediately.
Right.
Ah, I shouldn't have told Ned to "wait here". Being the blockhead that he is, he'll definitely stand and wait in the desert until I return.

Damnit, we're not getting our reward for this, are we?

I just bought some for you the last time I was here with Puggi.
That was the only time in six months!
Ugh, can't talk sense into you. Whatever, I won't care about you anymore!

Ned has already given me his marriage token.

a month later, I shall still marry him.
WHAT? I will not allow such a thing to happen! Stop right there!
